speaker: Duncan
text: *Laughing* Come on, you two! The best view awaits at the top! Don't you want to see?

speaker: Mary
text: *Panting* Slow down, Duncan! Anna can't keep up... and honestly, neither can I.

speaker: Anna
text: *Looking at the stream nervously* I'm... I'm not sure I can cross the stream like you did...

speaker: Mary
text: Duncan, we need to help Anna. She's scared and so am I.

speaker: Duncan
text: *Teasingly* Oh, are the river trolls spooking you, Anna? Alright, let's go back. You too, Missy.

speaker: Mary
text: *In surprise* Missy? Why would you... *her voice trails off* Anna's gone!

speaker: Duncan
text: *Softly* Alright, Missy, we need to calm down. We'll find her. But we need a torch, it's getting dark.

speaker: Mary
text: *Tears welling up* No! We can't leave her in these woods, Duncan!

speaker: Duncan
text: *Firmly* Missy, we need help. We can't find Anna in the dark. Let's go back to Grandma and Grandpa's. *Reluctantly, Mary and Duncan make their way back through the ever-darkening woods back to their grandparents' house, dreading the punishment in store for them, but dreading the fate of Anna even more.

speaker: Anna
text: *Grinning over a mug of hot cocoa* Well, well, well. You left me behind, did you? You should've seen your faces!

speaker: Duncan
text: *Laughing and hugging Anna* Anna! You scared us! But...I gotta admit, you got us good.

speaker: Mary
text: *Tears of relief streaming down* Oh, Anna! I'm so glad you're safe. Duncan, I'm...I'm proud of how you handled everything.
